EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 40 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 32-59N 014-27E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
